source_info.note: Comprehensive data extraction from official David Lloyd website, press releases, local news, reviews, and business directories. Coordinates estimated from postcode area due to lack of precise geocoding in sources. Opening hours show minor variation across sources (22:00 vs 22:30 weekday closing); 22:00 selected as more commonly cited. Review counts vary slightly between sources (368 vs 461); both retained in separate fields.; Processed by extraction on 2025-12-03 01:19:58
